name: Generate Snapshot
description:
Generates a [StructureDefinition](structuredefinition.html) instance  with  a snapshot, based on a differential in a specified [StructureDefinition](structuredefinition.html).   

If the operation is not called at the instance level, either *definition* or *url* 'in' parameters must be provided. If more than one is specified, servers may raise an error or may resolve with the parameter of their choice. If called at the instance level, these parameters will be ignored.

parameter.name: definition
parameter.documentation: The [StructureDefinition](structuredefinition.html) is provided directly as part of the request. Servers may choose not to accept profiles in this fashion

parameter.name: url
parameter.documentation: The StructureDefinition's canonical URL (i.e. 'StructureDefinition.url'). The server must know the structure definition, or be able to retrieve it from other known repositories.

parameter.name: return
parameter.documentation: The structure definition with a snapshot
